If all else fails go to www.google.com and type ".bin file type" it should tell you what opens that file type. ;)

http://www.free-downloads.net/downloads/Alcohol_52__Free_Edition/

For those of you who don't know what to do with the .bin file:

1. open notepad
2. paste this into it:

FILE "dev-lock.bin" BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00

3. save the file as dev-lock.cue (not dev-lock.cue.txt) in the same directory as the .bin file
4. mount the .cue file in daemon tools
5. enjoy!
